snippet: The New Jersey Performing Arts Center in Newark will host more than 100 events in its 2014-15 season, the center announced Wednesday.
abstract: The New Jersey Performing Arts Center in Newark will host more than 100 events in its 2014-15 season, the center announced Wednesday.

headline.main: Living Colour and Robeson Opera Among Highlights of New Jersey Arts Center Season
headline.print_headline: New Jersey Arts Center Announces New Season
